root: ^The task here is to take care of these little minions marching around.
^There are one or more buttons at the bottom of the screen.
^Click on them to set the right mode to help your minions.
^Every 10 seconds a minion becomes really sad.
^I mean so sad, that it will die if you don't comfort it.
^In this case you set comfort mode and click on the minion that needs your help.
^I hope comforting your minions lightens up your mind too :)
